page.title: 14 LEISURE AND RECREATION
page.content: THERE ARE THREE{CLUBS}IN THE AREA.THE FIRST IS A{GOLF CLUB}AT WORRALL.IT WAS FOUNDED IN 1920 AND HAS NOW ABOUT 700 MEMBERS,HALF OF WHOM ARE LOCALS.THE WISEWOOD AND DISTRICT HORTICULTURAL SOCIETY WAS FORMED IN 1935 BY A MR. GILLOTT AND A MR.MAY.THE SOCIETY MEETS EVERY TUESDAY BETWEEN 7.30 AND 9.00 PM.IT HAS A FULL COMMITTEE OF 12 PLUS A LADIES COMMITTEE,THE CHAIRMAN IS ONE MR.S.WADE.THE THIRD IS A BOYS{FOOTBALL {CLUB}CALLED SHEFFIELD RANGERS.ITS GROUND IS ON WADSLEY COMMON.THERE ARE SEVERAL{PUBS}IN THE AREA,WE WENT TO ONE CALLED 'THE WADSLEY JACK'.BEER IS 70p A PINT,COLA 33p PER HALF PINT.THE BEST TIME FOR TRADE IS 12-2 PM AND 9-11 PM.MOST PEOPLE HAVE TELEVISIONS AND RADIOS.THE FAVOURITE CRISPS ARE WALKERS PLAIN,THE BEST-SELLING CHOCOLATE BARS ARE MARS BARS.
